name: Loner Boy
description:
Loner Boy is a platform 2D game in which a boy that suffers from depression has to get out of the school where he was trapped an afternoon after school, in his way he will find multiple obstacles and problems that are reflections of his mood and mental stability, all this to try to find the only person that can help him get out of his depression. Our player must help the character on this mission passing through multiple levels between two dimensions. 

Documentation
